faqs.question: What electrical services do you offer in Miami Beach?
faqs.answer: We provide comprehensive electrical services throughout Miami Beach including panel upgrades (100A to 200A), emergency repairs, outlet and switch installation, lighting upgrades, ceiling fan installation, GFCI protection, EV charger installation, generator hookups, and 24/7 emergency service. Our licensed electricians serve all Miami Beach neighborhoods.

faqs.question: Are your electricians licensed to work in Miami Beach?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. All Solomon Electric technicians are Florida State Licensed (License #EC13012419) and fully insured. We pull all required Miami-Dade County permits for electrical work in Miami Beach, ensuring your project passes inspection and meets current NEC code requirements.

faqs.question: How do I know if my Miami Beach home needs a panel upgrade?
faqs.answer: Many Miami Beach homes have outdated 100-amp panels that can't handle modern electrical demands. Signs you need an upgrade include: frequently tripping breakers, dimming lights when appliances run, planning to add an EV charger or pool, or if you have a Federal Pacific, Zinsco, or fuse box. We offer free panel inspections throughout Miami Beach.

faqs.question: Do you offer 24/7 emergency electrical service in Miami Beach?
faqs.answer: Yes! We provide round-the-clock emergency electrical service to all Miami Beach neighborhoods. If you're experiencing sparking outlets, burning smells, power outages, or any electrical emergency, call us immediately—we respond quickly to protect your property and family.

faqs.question: Do you work with historic Miami Beach properties?
faqs.answer: Yes, we have extensive experience working within the historic districts of Miami Beach. We know how to upgrade electrical systems while respecting the architectural integrity of Art Deco and Miami Modern (MiMo) gems.

faqs.question: Can you install EV chargers in Miami Beach condo buildings?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. We specialize in navigating the complexities of EV charger installation in residential towers, including coordination with HOA boards and evaluating building load capacity.

seoContent.heading: Luxury Electrical Services in Miami Beach
seoContent.body: Miami Beach is more than a destination; it's a lifestyle. From the historic neon of South Beach to the ultra-exclusive estates on the Venetian Islands, Miami Beach requires a level of electrical service that is both technically superior and aesthetically conscious. Solomon Electric provides that expertise, ensuring your coastal home is both beautiful and resilient.

seoContent.body: Miami Beach homes and businesses have unique electrical requirements that demand local expertise. From aging infrastructure in established neighborhoods to modern smart home installations, we provide solutions tailored to Miami Beach's needs.

seoContent.heading: Comprehensive Electrical Services for Your Miami Beach Home
seoContent.body: Whether you're upgrading an older home's electrical system, installing modern energy-efficient lighting, adding an EV charger, or facing an urgent electrical issue, our licensed team delivers professional solutions throughout Miami Beach. seoContent.heading: Coastal Resilience for Your Beachfront Property
seoContent.body: Living on an island brings unique challenges to your electrical system. Corrosion is a constant threat, and storm surge protection is a necessity. Our team is specifically trained in coastal electrical best practices, using materials and techniques that withstand the harsh Miami Beach environment. We ensure your luxury investment is protected by a safe, robust, and modern electrical foundation.
